rows.label: qst710401_msg0001
rows.name:
Hmmm? Friends would like to
hear fine performance of Rikoko?
What happy thing you say!

rows.label: qst710401_msg0002
rows.name:
Dream of Rikoko is to be traveling
minstrel, plying sing-songy trade
in towns and cities of Alst.

rows.label: qst710401_msg0003
rows.name:
Rikoko turn a little green from
jealousy when bards Leon and
Azzaro came to town here...

rows.label: qst710401_msg0005
rows.name:
Rikoko perhaps able to team up with
Leon and Azzaro! Probably good for
career to make such connections!

rows.label: qst710401_msg0006
rows.name:
But...Rikoko shy like late-blooming
radish. Talk to new person, flushes
under fur and heart-afluttery.

rows.label: qst710401_msg0007
rows.name:
Not when blowing flute though! Rikoko
actually blossom like hot-house flower
under attention of everyone. Funny!

rows.label: qst710401_msg0008
rows.name:
So...perhaps friends could
act as middlepon and speak to
bards on behalf of Rikoko?

rows.label: qst710401_msg0009
rows.name:
Tell them all about passion of
Rikoko of blowing of flute!

rows.label: qst710401_msg0101
rows.name:
R-really? Azzaro want to
partner up with Rikoko?

rows.label: qst710401_msg0102
rows.name:
Ohoo! Because of this, career prospects
of Rikoko are much improved.

rows.label: qst710401_msg0103
rows.name:
Now Rikoko can huff and puff
flute in many far-off towns
and other exotic locations.

rows.label: qst710401_msg0201
rows.name:
Dream of Rikoko is share
huffy-puffy flute music with
people in far-away places.

rows.label: qst710401_msg0202
rows.name:
But Rikoko still little bit shy so
will wait here for time being.

rows.label: qst710401_msg0203
rows.name:
Please talk to bards Leon and Azzaro
for shy Rikoko. Right now, should be
near to Sachsum Gardens, making music!
